title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms Smart Reminder to gain higher engagement from audience
description: Copilot smart reminder will monitor and proactively share engagement and submission status to a form's owner in order to suggest follow-up actions. For example, if engagement is low, forms owners can leverage Copilot to send reminders for forms or quizzes quickly. Also, Copilot smart reminder can remind owners to check the insights when there are sufficient responses to make decisions.
